title: Available today!!! Beautiful community in Fairfield!!
map_address: 2751 Peppertree Dr near Cement Hill Rd.
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Welcome home to Laurel Creek, a beautifully landscaped apartment community in Northeast Fairfield, CA.
Take advantage of our convenient amenities and features that enhance your lifestyle and streamline your day-to-day.
Our studio, one and two-bedroom apartments include extras like air conditioning, a fireplace, and spacious closets.
Outside your doors is the fitness center, fully equipped with cardio and resistance equipment, along with an onsite laundry facility and available carport parking.
Your new home is also right across the street from a community park and quality local employers.
Life is good at Laurel Creek.
You’ll love your new neighborhood at Laurel Creek.
Right across the street is the beautiful Laurel Creek Park, where you’ll find baseball fields, a playground, and plenty of green space.
Take a break from the kitchen and indulge at the Texas Roadhouse, or grab a pick-me-up at Starbucks.
Quality employers like Travis Air Force Base and North Bay Medical Center are just around the corner from your front door.
Easily get to neighboring cities with a quick commute on I-80 and Highway 12.
Shared pool, Fitness center, Clubhouse, Barbecue
Fireplace, Hot tub / Spa, Non-Smoking Property, Vaulted Ceilings*
